title: New builds are not succeeding after the SHimplify change in M1 Macs.
body:
**Describe the bug**

The rapids plugin builds are failing on M1 mac, but succeeding in centos machines.

**Steps/Code to reproduce bug**
`mvn -Dbuildver=340 clean package -Drat.skip=true -DskipTests`

**Expected behavior**
The build was supposed to succeed

**Environment details (please complete the following information)**
M1 macbook pro

**Additional context**
```
[ERROR]   File "<script>", line 589, in <module>
[ERROR]   File "<script>", line 352, in task_impl
[ERROR]   File "<script>", line 366, in __generate_symlinks
[ERROR]   File "<script>", line 395, in __traverse_source_tree_of_all_shims
[ERROR]   File "<script>", line 366, in <lambda>
[ERROR]   File "<script>", line 416, in __generate_symlink_to_file
[ERROR]   File "<script>", line 295, in __makedirs
[ERROR]   File "/var/root/.m2/repository/org/python/jython-standalone/2.7.2/jython-standalone-2.7.2.jar/Lib/os$py.class", line 174, in makedirs
[ERROR] OSError: [Errno 20049] Unknown error: 20049: '/Users/spothireddi/work/repos/spark-rapids/sql-plugin/target/spark340/generated/src/main/scala/org/apache/spark/sql/rapids'
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] around Ant part ...<shimplify if="shimplify" />... @ 7:33 in /Users/spothireddi/work/repos/spark-rapids/sql-plugin/target/spark340/antrun/build-main.xml
```
